content: If anyone is interested in testing payer-to-payer transfer using SMART-on-FHIR our sandbox is available at https://fhir.careevolution.com/
Hi! My team is interested in testing out the patient access APIs, but I didn't see specifics on the agenda. Is that information somewhere that I missed? Thanks!
... we do not really need anything in the agenda do to the testing, do we?
kick off at 10am CT today. I have setup a breakout room for Patient Access API Payer exchange testing.
So we should join the formulary/plan-net track rather than the STU2 one it sounds like for patient access. and thank you mark!

Hi @Mark Scrimshire we are interested in the Patient Access API portion of the STU 2 track but are not sure about what servers to hit. This - Cross IG data referencing (Clinical → Directory, Clinical → Formulary).
@Mark Scrimshire what type interaction are you looking for with the Cross IG data referencing (Clinical > Directory, Clinical > Formulary)?
Does anybody else have a server using patient access API to test?
